rotations.name: Frankie's Pasture
rotations.notes: Good condition entering. Seeded after herd moved out.

rotations.name: Cedar Crest West
rotations.notes: No hay needed - tree cover (silvopasture) retained moisture during drought

rotations.name: Cedar Crest East
rotations.notes: HAY REQUIRED - hilltop exposed, drought stress, brown/dormant

rotations.name: Big Pasture
rotations.notes: Ice storm ~Jan 24. Hay supplementation throughout. Longest rotation this cycle.

rotations.name: Frankie's Pasture
rotations.notes: Green shoots regularly interspersed but largely brown from afar. Preemptive big hay bale + cattle cubes. Goal: eat some grass but allow most to rebound.

events.notes: Frankie's seeded â€” uncertain date, possibly mid-Nov while lingering summer grasses present. Green shoots near creek by late Jan despite drought.
Ice storm hit. Damaged above-ground forage but roots intact.
Big bale placed preemptively on Frankie's. Also providing cattle cubes. Herd moved from Big Pasture.
